title: United Arab Emirates dirham
summary: The United Arab Emirates dirham (/dirhəm/; Arabic: درهم إماراتي‎, sign: د.إ; code: AED), also known as simply the Emirati dirham, is the currency of the United Arab Emirates. The term dirham is officially abbreviated "AED", while unofficial abbreviations include "DH" or "Dhs.". The dirham is subdivided into 100 fils (فلس).
